alert.note: Alert for Loup (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 09 at 7:12PM CDT by NWS NorthPlatte
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern Loup, northeastern Logan, northern Custer, southern Blaine and southeastern Thomas Counties through 815 PM CDT... At 711 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Halsey, or 17 miles southeast of Thedford, moving southeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Broken Bow, Sargent, Merna, Anselmo, Dunning, Halsey, Victoria Springs State Recreation Area, Weissert, Lillian, Milburn, Milburn Diversion Dam State Wildlife Management Area, Round Valley, Walworth, Linscott, Divide Hill and Gates. This includes the following highways... Highway 183 between mile markers 110 and 123. Highway 2 between mile markers 221 and 286. Highway 92 between mile markers 269 and 273. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until midnight CDT for central, north central and west central Nebraska.
